text: Golden Eighties (also known as Window Shopping) is a 1986 Belgian French Swiss musical comedy movie directed by Chantal Akerman. It stars Delphine Seyrig, Myriam Boyer, Lio, Fanny Cottençon, Jean-François Balmer, Charles Denner and Pascale Salkin. ==Other websites== * * Category:1986 comedy movies Category:1986 musical movies Category:Belgian comedy movies Category:Belgian musical movies Category:French comedy movies Category:French musical movies Category:Swiss comedy movies Category:Swiss musical movies Category:Movies directed by Chantal Akerman Category:Movies set in shopping malls
title: Golden Eighties
